channel.title: Showcase on nuaNce's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Showcase on nuaNce's blog

item.title: Some of My Favorite Software
item.description: Just a list of some software I find nice to use, most are pretty minimal as well: cfm - Simple and fast terminal file manager maim - extremely powerful CLI screenshot tool SXIV - “Simple X Image Viewer” giph - Customizable and easy to use GIF recorder birch - Freenode IRC client written in bash farge - Finally a lightweight CLI colorpicker ungoogled-chromium - Browse safely and privately, no compromises
